hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #Din's Fire# and #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #4# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Strength Upgrade#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a #Big Skulltula# guarding a Gold one.

GC (Medigoron).text: Fingers-Mazda, the first thief in the world, stole fire from the gods.^But he was unable to fence it.&It was too hot.&He got really burned on that deal.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #spider behind a muddy wall# in a grotto holds #a Green Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Water Temple Small Key#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the Groose is loose.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #lakeside lab diving experiment# rewards #a Hylian Shield#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Eyedrops# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #7# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Morpha#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Kokiri Shop#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern End of Bridge Chest

LH (Lab).text: This isn't where I parked my horse!

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Man in Green's House#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #1# major item.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Market#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #the Bolero of Fire#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say you can cut corners to get to your destination faster.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Boss Key# and #a Forest Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 1 Bottom

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Near Four Armos Chest
